name: Littlest Pet Shop
description:
Experience your favorite LITTLEST PET SHOP pets in a whole new way! Now
you can enjoy LITTLEST PET SHOP on the go on your Nintendo DSi system.
Play catch with your pets and their favorite toys, dress them up in
adorable new accessories, and keep them happy by brushing and feeding
them treats! You can even throw a little dance party for your pets and
help them rock out to cool songs!
